featured.text: The jewel of the architecture is the 22-domed Transfiguration Church, built in the early 1700s.

definition.zh_def: 變形，特別是外觀或性質的改變。
definition.en_def: The act of changing in form, appearance, or nature, especially in a magical or dramatic way.
definition.example: The wizard performed a transfiguration spell to turn the frog into a prince.
